snippet.title: Out of Sight VR Announcement Trailer | VR Games Showcase Spring 2025
snippet.description:
The Gang and Starebreeze's anticipated horror game, Out of Sight, is getting a VR version, courtesy of Flat2VR Studios!

Wishlist Out of Sight VR and read more from Flat2VR: https://linktr.ee/Flat2VRStudiosVRGS

Developed by The Gang and adapted to VR by Flat2VR Studios, Out of Sight VR is a dark, atmospheric puzzle adventure that flips traditional VR gameplay on its head. Instead of seeing through Sophie’s eyes, players inhabit her stuffed companion, strategically positioning themselves to guide her through the mansion’s treacherous corridors. Every sound, every flicker of movement in the distance could mean salvation—or something far worse. As Sophie’s protector, you must solve intricate puzzles, evade sinister captors, and unravel the dark history of the house, all while navigating from a unique, 2nd person perspective.
